The researcher is the Almighty saying: Is that in that, etc.The preaching of the division of it and its affirmation from the way of the kiniyah, so this is a sign of the division of it and the meaning of the dimension of the distance That is, whether it is mentioned from the things a division, that is: it is divided by it for a stone, that is, it is right for him to divide it with a shame and a greatness, and what is meant is that This way was dominated by the truth and the expression of the matter, and this is as the speaker says after the remembrance of a sign and the sacrifice of the connotation on the authority of this قُلْناهُ.It is permissible that the investigation be that the wounds are confirmed by the same as that division of it, so it also indicates that it is most of it and its affirmation, and it will be sure of it.The sections, in my sections with these things, are sections of the acceptance of acceptance with it, and it is accustomed to it, and it does the same, and it is confirmed by the division of it?And the two faces, while it is referring to the affirmation of the division of one of it, except that the face is different as it is not hidden, and perhaps the first is the appearance and the mind of the mind; Because his owner is stagnant; That is, he prevents him from havoes as he does not want, as he called a mind and forbidding because he is reasonable and forbidden and a hoop of statistics, which is the firm.Al -Farah said: It is said that it is a stone if it is capable of itself in connection with it and the division of it is deleted; It is to be tormented as he predicts his saying, the Almighty:
